name: Headstrong
description:
Headstrong is a school project made by our group, Game Juice.

It is a local, multiplayer, sport, beat 'em up in which the players must fight one another, steal opponents heads, and use them to score goals. It uses a very cartoony art and animation style, and is violence without harm.

We plan on creating a fuller, more content filled game, so please give your feedback as it would be much appreciated.
